plot: Danny, a man suffering from Tourettes Syndrome, is filmed during his day-to-day life, doing everyday activities such as going to the supermarket or mowing the lawn, all whilst swearing constantly.
plot_en: Danny, a man suffering from Tourettes Syndrome, is filmed during his day-to-day life, doing everyday activities such as going to the supermarket or mowing the lawn, all whilst swearing constantly.
plot_es: Danny, a man suffering from Tourettes Syndrome, is filmed during his day-to-day life, doing everyday activities such as going to the supermarket or mowing the lawn, all whilst swearing constantly.
title: The Tourettes Guy
